entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having a friend in Hermione, and it's lucky for him. He doesn't know how he'd have done his homework without her.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as Harry's friend who helped him with his homework and lent him a book. She also became more relaxed about breaking rules after being saved by Harry and Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the people who saved Hermione from the mountain troll, which made her more relaxed about breaking rules.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are friends, as mentioned in the text. Harry is lucky to have her as a friend.
Ron and Harry saved Hermione from the mountain troll, which made her more relaxed about breaking rules.
